body.name: Supershieldz (3 Pack) Designed for Samsung Galaxy S21 5G [Not Fit for Galaxy S21 Ultra] Tempered Glass Screen Protector, Anti Scratch, Bubble Free
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 16 hrs 10 mins
features: Compatible for: Samsung Galaxy S21 5G (6.2 inch display model only).
[Fingerprint ID] re-scan your fingerprint after application and adjust touch screen sensitivity.
Made from the high quality tempered-glass for maximum scratch protection and no residue when removed
2.5D rounded edge glass for comfort on the fingers and hand
9H hardness, 99.99% HD clarity, and maintains the original touch experience
Hydrophobic and oleo-phobic coating to reduce sweat and reduce fingerprints
Include 3 pcs tempered glass screen protectors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Goes on easy
reviews.reviewText: The screen protector goes on easy. I didn't end up with a single bubble. At first the finger print sensor wasn't functioning properly but after a little while it seems to register just fine. Over all highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good stuff. Right price
reviews.reviewText: I only use Supershieldz. They keep my phone screen protected. If they crack, they don't shatter. The fit is fantastic. They're easy to remove and install. You get everything you need in the kit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, great to have 3 pack in case of issues
reviews.reviewText: The screen protector I installed 3 years ago got shredded up after a particularly gnarly drop and squeeze. I was happy to find these as replacements. After easily yanking the old screen protector off, I turned my phone off and went to town on the whole phone with the provided alcohol wipe, then cleaned the screen as instructed with the low lint cloth. After a quick alignment by eye, I peeled and put one protector sticky side down. It doesn't go up to the edges of the screen, which means I can fit a variety of cases onto my S21. I used the low lint cloth to rub out bubbles. All touch screen functions work on my S21 and my phone looks brand new again with a new case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not perfect but really good
reviews.reviewText: The cut of it is a little small. It leaves a little too much room around the edge of the phone, but that's about where a case pulls over so the margin really is small enough to where I don't worry about it. I will gladly keep buying these over those stupid flexible zagg ones simply for how these feel. These ones keep the true glass feeling while the zagg ones just feel like what they are: plastic. These are really smooth and I love it. The adhesive is also really nice. Got a hair stick under the screen and it stuck back down perfectly after pulling it up to remove the hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: See the photo - it shows what the front of my S21 phone looked like after it was lost on a main road in a small town. Too embarrassing to tell how it became "lost" on a road, suffice it to say that it was face down at the edge of a traffic lane for over 40 minutes. Google "find my device" helped me find it (perfect location accuracy - I was amazed). Many tire tracks across the backside of the phone when I picked it up, and the photo shows what looks like a completely damaged screen on the front. It had been repeatedly pressed down into the fairly coarse pavement with I'm sure lots and lots of weight, many times.Long story short: I removed the screen protector and found zero damage to the S21 screen. Absolutely nothing - it was (and still is) in perfect as-new condition. I can't imagine how the sharp points of the rough pavement didn't penetrate the screen protector, but it performed amazingly well and completely protected my screen under extreme conditions.I have a low profile case protector as well, which I'm sure helped (will leave separate review for that), but this screen protector is fantastic and the only brand I will ever use.On a side note - it seems to degrade the S21 fingerprint detector just a bit, but if I occasionally refresh the fingerprints the phone detects reliably and I'm happy with its performance in this respect.Thank you Supershieldz!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice product for the price.
reviews.reviewText: product was used to once again protect my phone screen which I thought was shattered. Come to find out only the screen protector was cracked. I like this protector because it is thick and sturdy and chances of breaking are far and in between. Thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fits okay, but no fingerprint scan
reviews.reviewText: I had previously purchased tempered glass from this manufacturer for another phone that used fingerprint scanning and it worked perfectly. Unfortunately, with my 24 ultra, the sensor won't recognize at all.The fit could go a little farther to the bezel in my opinion. If I swipe from the sides, I can definitely feel the edges catch. The top and bottom is fine, but the left to right is a little narrow.The glass is super smooth and clear though.Going to have to try something else because I need to fingerprint ability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good brand, but fingerprint sensor will NOT work
reviews.reviewText: Good brand, have used on other phones/tablets before. These always provide great scratch protection for the screens leaving them like new years later if kept covered with these.Adheres nicely with no remaining bubbles.Unfortunately, the glass screen protector is the exact size of the lit screen area, so if you don't apply perfectly straight, small areas of the screen are not covered and there's no alignment device.The fingerprint sensor will NOT work, it won't even take fingerprints with this glass screen protector applied.S-pen will not always register as having touched the screen with this applied.
Excelente calidad, gran diseño, finos acabados y sumamente resistente

Far and away the best screen protector I've ever had on a phone. Crystal clear, no bubbles, super easy installation. Fingerprint works near flawlessly. Great finger feel too. 6/5 stars for a screen protector that finally works for samsung!

reviews.reviewTitle: Doesn't fit the phone too big
reviews.reviewText: One protector was cracked. No cut near the front camera. Too big for the phone. Totally disappointed. Can't even return it because I used the cleaning products
Great product the screen protectors were super easy to apply and you cant even tell there is anything there looks great
Buen producto. Coloque la mía y después de 2 años (y algunas caídas) continúa en buen estado.
